title: Why disabled Smartburst
content:
Why Google ?
Google you should do something about that I don't know why you  decided to disabled SmartBurst in favor of Topshot I mean seriously how you can compare Topshot with Smartburst. It's like comparing Dust with gold. I am a fan big of pixel because of its promising camera features but with disabling the one of best feature which make it worth, then you are loosing your Market which starts from me. 
P.S
WE WANT SMARTBURST BACK ON ALL DEVICES
